txt.en: 'Ghûrdhos balance the nature of this forest. Neither friend nor foe, they exist. Eyes of Ghûrdhos change. No more balance, now cruel eyes of enemy. Not Orcs; a deeper darkness, an ancient fear rises up. Help us subdue Ghûrdhos. Bring balance back to Drúadan Forest.'
Ghân-buri-Ghân, chieftain of the Drúedain, asks of you to defeat Ghûrdhos that have recently become angered by unknown means.
'You have done well. Show your heart beat with balance of forest. May your stories be well, [placeholder].'
Ghûrdhos can be found throughout the Drúadan Forest.\n\nYou should defeat Ghûrdhos.
Ghân-buri-Ghân can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Ghân-buri-Ghân.
